vision_analysis.read_text: MENU APPETIZERS PRIX FIXE Shrimp Remoulade/Shrimp Cocktail . . . 16.00 Three Courses: 45 Spicy Lobster . 19.00 First Course: Lobster Bisque Baked Escargot 16.00 Entrée: Cornish Game Hen, Seared Ahi Tuna 17.00 Grilled Salmon or 12 oz Sirloin Prosciutto Wrapped Mozzarella . 14.00 Dessert: Bananas Foster STEAK CUTS - SALADS AND SOUPS Filet Mignon. 8 ounce . . 38.00 Spinach Salad . 9.50 Apples, goat cheese, apple cider dressing Filet Mignon, 12 ounce . 49.00 Caprese Salad .7.50 Rib Eye Steak, 18 ounce . 39.00 Ripe tomato with fresh mozzarella and basil Porterhouse for Two . 40.00 French Onion Soup .5.00 ...... 200

recommendations.reason: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids and lean protein, aligning with a balanced diet and moderate calorie target.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Request to be grilled with minimal oil and served with steamed vegetables instead of heavy sides if available.

recommendations.reason: High in protein and healthy fats, with moderate calories, fitting a balanced health goal.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Ask for it to be seared lightly with minimal oil and served with a side of greens.

recommendations.menu_item: Spinach Salad (Apples, goat cheese, apple cider dressing)
recommendations.reason: Provides leafy greens, fiber, and a moderate amount of healthy fats from goat cheese, suitable for a balanced meal.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Request the dressing on the side to control portion and reduce added sugars.

recommendations.menu_item: Caprese Salad (Ripe tomato with fresh mozzarella and basil)
recommendations.reason: Light and fresh with healthy fats from mozzarella and antioxidants from tomatoes, fitting a moderate calorie target.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Ask for a light drizzle of olive oil instead of heavier dressings.

items_to_avoid.reason: Large portion size and high in saturated fats, which may not align with a moderate calorie target or balanced diet.
Typically high in sugar and calories, not ideal for a balanced or moderate-calorie meal.
Often prepared with butter and rich sauces, which can be high in calories and fats.
High in sodium and saturated fats due to processed meat and cheese, less ideal for balanced health goals.
